archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Audit Component
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Implements the functionality of providing support for the principle of accountability, which is holding users of a system accountable for their actions within the system, and detection of policy violations. The audit policy defines the elements of an information system which need to be traced, for example to assure traceability of actions: what, how, when, where and with what.
Based on The Open Group: http://www.opengroup.org/security/das/xdas_int.htm
